update.name: JEM Package
update.changes: JEM 2.3.6 released on May 11 2023. First JEM version offering PHP8 compatibility. Please refer to the change log for details.; If you use template overrides please note that all views have been changed and there is a good chance that your overrides won't work as expected. So please check the changes and adapt your files.; Versions previous to 2.3.2 will not install correctly on Joomla 3.10.1!; This version of JEM is not yet compatible with Joomla!4. You will have to upgrade to JEM 4.x for that!

update.name: JEM Package
update.changes: JEM 4.2.1 released on April, 25th, 2024. Update release of JEM 4.2.1 offering bugfixes and some new functionality. Please refer to the change log for details.; If you are upgrading from JEM 2.x and Joomla 3 and use template overrides please note that all views have been changed and there is a good chance that your overrides won't work as expected.; So please check the changes and adapt your files.; For migration from JEM on Joomla 3.10.x, don't uninstall, only disable plugin and modules. Versions previous to 2.3.5 will not migrate correctly'; Since version 4.2.0, JEM is compatible with Joomla! 5.
